member.name: T:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.ConlusionCellAlignment
member.summary: Represents a rule that describes for the just-one-cell puzzles only produce conclusions in row 5, column 5 and block 5.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.ConlusionCellAlignment.NotLimited
member.summary: Indicates conclusion cell can be everywhere.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.ConlusionCellAlignment.CenterHouse
member.summary: Indicates conclusion cell can only be inside row 5, column 5 and block 5.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.ConlusionCellAlignment.CenterBlock
member.summary: Indicates conclusion cell can only be inside block 5.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.ConlusionCellAlignment.CenterCell
member.summary: Indicates the conclusion cell must be r5c5.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Generating.JustOneCell.JustOneCellPuzzle
member.summary: Represents the answer to a just-one-cell sudoku puzzle.

param.name: step
param.para: Indiactes the step for the pattern.
Assign a not- value to this parameter if argument is . Set the arguments of constructor to be [], [] and () respectively, in order to avoid the potential bug on displaying details.
